Class ArchiveServerTest

java.lang.Object
com.laoluade.ingestor.ao3.ArchiveServerTest
@SpringBootTest(useMainMethod=ALWAYS) @AutoConfigureMockMvc public class ArchiveServerTest extends Object

This test class is used to run unit tests and integration tests for the ArchiveServer Spring Boot application.

    Field
    Description
    private static final ArrayList<String>
    expectedComponents

    This test attribute is used to hold the runtime used to run system commands.

  • Method Details

    • setupTests

      @BeforeAll public static void setupTests() throws IOException, InterruptedException

      This test method sets up the test links, message service, and Selenium container.

      Throws:
      IOException - If the ArchiveIngestor.getJSONFromFilepath() line experiences an I/O exception.
      InterruptedException - If the Thread.sleep() is interrupted mid-execution.

    • testIndex

      @Test public void testIndex(@Autowired org.springframework.test.web.servlet.MockMvc mvc) throws UnsupportedEncodingException

      This test method tests retrieving the index.html file.

      Parameters:
      mvc - The mock Spring MVC server.
      Throws:
      UnsupportedEncodingException - If the response content is in an unsupported encoding.

    • testAPIBasic

      @Test public void testAPIBasic(@Autowired org.springframework.test.web.servlet.MockMvc mvc) throws UnsupportedEncodingException

      This test method tests retrieving the /api/v1 and /api/v1/spec URLs.

      Parameters:
      mvc - The mock Spring MVC server.
      Throws:
      UnsupportedEncodingException - If the response content is in an unsupported encoding.

    • runResultTests

      public void runResultTests(ArchiveServerResponseData response, String sessionId, boolean isInit, boolean usesNickname)

      This test method runs assertion tests for a given archive server response.

      Parameters:
      response - An ArchiveServerResponseData object.
      sessionId - The session ID of the response.
      isInit - Flag for the response being the initial response.
      usesNickname - Flag for expecting a username in the response.

    • runSessionTest

      public void runSessionTest(org.springframework.test.web.servlet.MockMvc mvc, org.springframework.test.web.servlet.MvcResult initialResult, boolean usesNickname) throws UnsupportedEncodingException, InterruptedException

      This test method runs a loop where the MVC retrieves updates to an ongoing session and tests the response contents.

      Parameters:
      mvc - The Spring Boot MVC server.
      initialResult - The initial MVC result.
      usesNickname - Flag for if the test session is expecting a nickname to be present in responses.
      Throws:
      UnsupportedEncodingException - If a response's content is in an unsupported encoding.
      InterruptedException - If the Thread.sleep() line is interrupted mid-execution.

    • testAPIParse

      public void testAPIParse(org.springframework.test.web.servlet.MockMvc mvc, String testLink, String parseURI, boolean usesNickname) throws UnsupportedEncodingException, InterruptedException

      This test method is used to create an ArchiveServerRequestData object to send to the archive server then test the progress responses.

      Parameters:
      mvc - The Spring Boot MVC server.
      testLink - The test AO3 story/chapter link to use.
      parseURI - The archive server parsing API endpoint to use.
      usesNickname - Flag for if the test session is expecting a nickname to be present in responses.
      Throws:
      UnsupportedEncodingException - If a response's content is in an unsupported encoding.
      InterruptedException - If the Thread.sleep() line in runSessionTest() is interrupted mid-execution.

    • testAPIParseCombinations

      @Test public void testAPIParseCombinations(@Autowired org.springframework.test.web.servlet.MockMvc mvc) throws UnsupportedEncodingException, InterruptedException

      This test method is used to stress test different archive parsing combinations.

      Parameters:
      mvc - The Spring Boot MVC server.
      Throws:
      UnsupportedEncodingException - If a response's content in testAPIParse() is in an unsupported encoding.
      InterruptedException - If the Thread.sleep() line in runSessionTest() is interrupted mid-execution.

    • testWebsocketFeed

      @Test public void testWebsocketFeed(@Autowired org.springframework.test.web.servlet.MockMvc mvc, @Autowired org.springframework.messaging.support.AbstractSubscribableChannel brokerChannel) throws UnsupportedEncodingException, InterruptedException

      This test method is used to test the handling of the client sending a bad session ID.

      Parameters:
      mvc - The Spring Boot MVC server.
      brokerChannel - The AbstractSubscribableChannel used to connect to the websocket.
      Throws:
      UnsupportedEncodingException - If a response's content is in an unsupported encoding.
      InterruptedException - If the Thread.sleep() line is interrupted mid-execution.

    • shutdownSelenium

      @AfterAll public static void shutdownSelenium() throws InterruptedException

      This test method is used to shut down running aspects of the archive server tests.

      Throws:
      InterruptedException - If the waitFor() lines is interrupted mid-execution.
